about_the_game:
Errships is a wild co-op game where you and your goblin pals build crazy flying machines out of junk. Team up to tackle increasingly tough challenges as you try to reach the top of a mysterious tower being guarded by mechanical baddies.

Get creative with the physics-based ship building system. Design all sorts of wacky vessels and see what your friends come up with too. Share blueprints online to show off your craziest ideas or get inspiration from other players.

The real fun is in playing together. Join forces in roguelike runs to see how high you can climb. Can you and your crew overcome the tower's dangers and uncover its secrets?

Errships blends teamwork, shipbuilding, and exciting challenges into one unique package. So gather your friends, slap together some scrap, and take to the skies. Adventure awaits!
